column6: TEXT
column17: SUMMARY
column18: DEBRIEFING

column6: Good morning, *name*! {Busy} as always, are we? What are you {up to today}?
column17: Gnomes will make great difference
column18: What a pretty bunch these gnomes!

column6: Great! I am planning to {redecorate} our backyard today!
Yes. I need something, though. Could you get me {two pretty garden gnomes}? From {Mr. Ross}, for example, his gnomes are extra cute.
column7: No problem, I have one already

column6: They’ll make an excellent addition to {my collection}. Thank you. Get {this recipe} I learned from your gran!
By the way, I heard the cook in our {local soup kitchen} caught a cold. They’re looking for someone to {volunteer}. You could try it.
I heard you helped out at the {soup kitchen}. I am so proud of you, I raised a {wonderful daughter}, both talented and kind
column17: Stuff always disappears when it's needed for cooking!
column18: Thank you. That’s a very pretty dishcloth.

column6: By the way, I was cooking {today’s dinner} and I realized all our {dishrags} are dirty and just I can’t find the {strainer}! Could you go look for them?

column7: Hope the dinner is worth it.

column6: I wonder, where did you get this dishcloth? I coulde use more of those.
column7: It’s for my help in the soup kitchen

column6: Here, I wanted to give you another of your {grandmother’s recipes}. She was a great cook, as you know, so I’m sure you’ll love this one.
Hey, sis! Good thing you came by! Jonny told me he gave you the {console} he promised me
column17: Hurry up! I have to go on this raid or I'll be kicked out of the party!
column18: You’re the best sister!

column7: I suppose I was tricked into cooking

column6: He made you cook the {snacks} for our DnD night, right? Ha-ha! Well played, bro, well-played.
Anyway, did you get the {console}? I promised guys I’ll go on a raid with them in fifteen minutes!
Get this: I made a {perfect sandwich recipe}. It’s pure science! I'm {yet to finish} it, I’ll give you the rest later.
I’ve seen your {vlog entry}, love it! But you need to improve the {technical side}. I heard there’s a {cooking contest} you can win good stuff in.
So, did you take part in that {contest} I told you about? I hope {you won} lot’s of cool stuff!
column17: We'll make you the best food blogger ever!
column18: Awesome! I’ll work on this now, and on my king recipe as well.

column6: I can help you make the {perfect gear} for your videos, but only if you bring me the parts
Let’s see… I need a {camera}, a {tripod} and an {hdmi-cable}. Cool?
The work is {going great}! I’ll make your gear and you’ll be able to {shoot the best} quality vids, sis, and {conquer the Internet}.
column17: Just a little favor, okay?
column18: Great. You got everything I need.

column7: Do you need something in exchange?

column6: Could you get me a {notepad} and {dice}? I need it for the game tonight!
I {finished} working on your gear and the recipe, and I also have a {surprise} for you!
I sent your videos to a {sponsor} and they liked it! They offer you to {go to France}, learn local recipes and film more cool videos.
No! That’s {reality}! I’m shocked too, but that’s a {great opportunity}. You have to go! And may the Force be with you.
Welcome to {France}, my second homeland! Great adventures lie ahead, just help people and people will help you!
column17: Your first task is getting me some wine
column18: Great choice!

column6: I'm actually half French. That's why I can also teach you a traditional {French recipe} passed from generation to generation!
Of course, a family heirloom isn't something I'll part with easily, first you'll have to prove you're good for this job!
While you're looking around, could you get me some wine and a glass, please? They're easy to find around here!
Excellent! See, it's no big deal to find wine around here. You chose a great bottle too!
You really got off on the right foot! I can see I was right to choose you for this!
column17: Cool shade makes cool producers
column18: Now I hope I'll stop this sweating

column6: I have another task for you. It might seem dull, but it's a great chance for you to walk around and meet locals.
I need an umbrella to hold off the summer sun. If you get one, I'll be in much better mood, and you need me in a good mood.
So, now that you proved yourself worthy let's try something more exciting: let's help out the locals!
column17: Giving a helping hand to locals is a very important part of your job
column18: Doesn't helping people feel great?

column6: You might've noticed there's something wrong with the lavender fields. I asked around and it seems some kind of bug is to blame
People say that if they only had some special plant medicine, they could restor the fields. So, let's get some!
There's another person you could help. A famous truffle supplier lives nearby. I heard there's something troubling her these days.
She can definitely share some great recipes if you help her out. Her name's Monique, by the way.
Ohhh my poor piggy! Wait, who are you, what do you want? Read the sign, we’re closed. Piggy crisis!
column7: I understand, but I wanted to talk
column17: Bonbon is freezing his chops off!
column18: Oh, you're a true savior!

column6: Whatever you need! Bonbon‘s health is my only concern right now. He is terribly, terribly sick. Go away!
Oh, you really want to help? That's so sweet of you! What did you say your name was?
Thank you, *name*! Could you get my little Bonbon a blanket and a pillow? I’d go myself, but I can’t leave him, I just can’t!
My Bonbon is warm now, but he's still sick! I don’t know what to do! I’m going to faint, mon dieu!
column17: Ohhh hurry, please, save his bacon!
column18: I hope this medicine works!

column6: How? Oh, what if he’s dying? What am I gonna do without my piggy petit pois! I’ll die too!
Maybe… I know! We should get him some medicine. That'll help, I hope. I can only hope now!
You brought the medicine? Thank you so so much! I hope it works and Bonbon is back to his lively self again!

column7: It'll break my heart if it doesn't

column6: Oh, Bonbon seems to be feeling better! Thank you so much! What would I have done without you. You saved my baby!
column7: I am glad to hear that
column17: Did you get the ingredients? Bonbon is hungry!
column18: Looks yammy!

column6: But I think now that he’s recovering, we should help him get better
He needs more nutrients! We need to cook up my special piggy food for him. Would you bring some ingredients?
Very nice! Now'll brew a health potion for my sweet baby and he's gonna be all recovered, my brioche délicieux!
Well, we've been doing a great job so far, but now I'll have to leave you on your own for a bit.
column12: Well, we've been doing a great job so far, but now I'll have to leave you on your own for a bit.
column17: The allergy is horrible, believe me
column18: You got the spray, I'm saved!

column6: I am going to a picnic with some of my local friends. I'd really appreciate if you help me prepare, I'll give you another recipe in exchange
column12: I am going to a picnic with some of my local friends. I'd really appreciate if you help me prepare, I'll give you another recipe in exchange

column6: First and foremost, I need a mosquito spray. I have a horrible allergy, aching all over, you know
Now, I need one last thing, and you can fly free, for a while at least.
column17: I am going for a picnic, so I need all the picnic stuff
column18: Well, I suppose that's what I meant

column6: Well, it's a picnic, so I need a picnic basket, right? Could you get me one of those nice things stuffed with everything for a picnic
column7: Yes, I know what you mean

column6: I should get going very soon, but first a piece of advice: talk to Claude Lacroix
He's a renowned restaurant critic and a champion of fine cuisine. Making his acquaintance will definitely help you in the future.
column7: I'll try to make a good impression

column6: So, you say you're an aspiring food blogger? Good for you, but, sorry to say, you're too small a fish for me
column17: This bread was really great, we need to restore the mill. Let's throw a dinner.
column18: A decent tablecloth, not bad, *name*

column6: On second thought, I could use your help. I'm here on a mission of sorts. Have you noticed the mill by the village?
It used to make excellent lavender bread, but the enterprise went bankrupt. I invited some potential sponsors for a dinner to revive it.
Let's say I am fond of good food. Anyway, I need some tablecloth for this occasion. You could help if you want my attention.
Well, considering you're willing to help - a quality so rare these days - I am willing to change my attitude.
column17: This mill is important for local economy and taste culture, so the dinner must be top notch.
column18: An excellent choice of plate pattern, *name*

column7: Late recognition is better then nothing

column6: I'll even teach you some recipes I learned during my long and varied career. But you'll have to help me too, that's called quid pro quo.
For this dinner we're organizing, we need cutlery and a service. I trust you to handle that.
You see, *name*, we're almost ready for this dinner that will redefine the history of this region's gastronomy for years.
column17: We're almost ready to begin this dinner, that will stay in history
column18: Very nice!

column6: Be proud to assist in something actually important! Get me a few wine glasses for my guests. We're going to drink Chateau Margaux
column7: For such wine - best glasses only

column6: Thanks a lot for your help, allow me to apologize for my rude behavior before. You're a very talented young lady.

column7: Of course you changed your mind

column6: We did great work today. I promise you, very soon you'll see this mill's blades moving again!
I am so happy that my cute little Bonbon is happy and healthy again. Look at his cute pink cheeks!
column17: Get my baby a cute costume, please
column18: This is so cute, I love it!

column6: We have to dress him up, so he's even cuter! I already imagine the cuteness, si joli!
column7: Yes, I can see it too, super cute!
Yeah, pig in a coat, what could be cuter

column6: Don't worry, I know you're a busy girl, so I'll teach you a recipe if you help me. I'll let you pet Bonbon a bit too!
Look, look, he looks so sweet in this costume, mon brioche délicieux
column17: More cuteness, we need more cuteness!
column18: That's a total cuteness overload!

column6: Yet I feel there's something missing. We can make him even more adorable, don't you think?
I know! A cute little bow is exactly what he needs. This will make him just irresistibly adorable!

column7: What exactly do you plan to do with it?

column6: Now that Bonbon is so-so adorable we just have to preserve this image of his forever.
column17: I'm so anxious to take photos of my Bonbon!
column18: Wonderful! Here, get the recipe!

column6: I want to take lots and lots of photos of him today to celebrate his recovery! Will you help me?
I don't have a proper camera, you know, just some crappy one. This moment is worth quality shots.
Thank you so so much for all the help! I hope you enjoy this recipe, it's one of my favorites. Cook it a lot, won't you?

column7: I'll take your word for it

column6: Oh, you again. Come here, *name*. I have something I want to ask of you.
column17: I can't handle this phone problem without some calming wine.
column18: I hope I can handle it now. Here, take this for your troubles.

column6: Do you have any technical expertise? There's something wrong with my phone, I can't wrap my mind around it.
That's a pity, really. Could you bring me a pin to open the card slot at least? And some wine, that's for my nerves.
I finally managed to get my phone to work and received the important call I've been waiting for. I have magnifique news!
column17: This is a historic event, so we need to prepare!
column18: Very good, thank you. Now the villagers can get to work

column6: A famous baker from Paris is going to come here to inspect the mill and its lavender bread. Perhaps he'll buy it for his restaurant!
We have to prepare for his visit. This village doesn't look festive enough! I already arranged with the locals to improve this situation.
column7: Can I help in any way?

column6: What I need from you are saws and shovels for the workers! S'il vous plaît!
While the locals are working, we have to get to work too! We need to beautify this place!
column17: The idea to decorate this village with garlands is excellent! And entirely mine.
column18: Oh, so fresh!

column6: I am thinking flower garlands. If we make them out of lavender, it'll emphasize the specialty of this beautiful region.
Excellent! Now we only have to put these garlands on, and this place will evoke a magical feeling! Come and check it out later.
You know, I was examining the venue we're to meet with the patissier in, and it just won't do!
column17: We can't greet an esteemed guest with these chairs!
column18: You saved the day! Merci beaucoup!

column6: All the furniture is of questionable quality! What to expect of a village! Yet the chairs are the worst.
Please, do something about the chairs! We need comfortable chairs. When people are comfortably seated they're more inclined to negotiate.
Hello, *name*! How's your day? Mine is totally great: we're going truffle hunting with Bonbon! He's a truffle hog, you know!
column17: Do you knit? I love knitting! I knit hats for Bonbon.
column18: Oh, thank you, you're a real friend!

column6: Yes, and we're going to the forest. The key to supplying the best truffles is picking them yourself.
That's a long road, however, I'll need a distraction. Could you bring me knitting needles? And I'll teach you an excellent truffle recipe!
Have you seen weather forecast? Apparently it's gonna be extremely hot and sunny in the next few days!
column17: I hope the heat won't stop us from picking lots of truffles
column18: What a pretty hat!

column6: This means I'll need a hat when truffle hunting. Sunstroke is a real danger!
Could you help me with the hat? And also find some mosquito spray for me, alright? I'll make it worth your while.
Thank you so much, for everything. I'm so happy I met you. I hope you like the recipes I taught you.
column7: I'm happy I met you too

column6: Now it's time for me and Bonbon to get going. Truffles await! Goodbye, name, I hope we meet again! And good luck with your blog!

column7: I don't need luck, I'm fabulous

column6: I heard you helped Monique, so that she opened orders for truffles again! And you assisted Claude with that lavender bread deal.
column17: Taking care of the sound quality in your videos is the top priority!
column18: This is a great mic!

column6: Amazing! You're so capable! This deal'll bring prosperity to the village; and everyone will be thrilled to hear Monique is back in business!
column7: Oh, I am glad to hear that

column6: However I watched a bunch of your recent videos and I have to say you have to work on the sound.
I think you need a proper microphone to record the sound. If you get one, I'll connect it for you.
I have great news for you! Since you did so well here, I've arranged for you to go to Paris!
column17: Sorry, I can't tell you more about this experiment
column18: Thank you! This'll really help me.

column6: You'll be able to meet some of France's most prominent chefs and learn from them. Amazing, right?
But before you go, could you do your benefactor one last favor? I am doing a little experiment, so I need a pestle and mortar and a plate.
Don't let me delay you any longer, it's your time to conquer Paris!
Hello. So, you're *name*, food blogger, am I correct? It's nice to meet you. My name is Gabriel, I'm the owner of this restaurant.
column17: Some administrative duties first
column18: Great! You passed your first test.

column6: Well, I received a word that you're interested in learning from us, especially from Enzo. That's an admirable goal.
I'll gladly let you intern here for a bit, especially if you advertise us in your blog. But before you get to the kitchen...
We have a tradition: the new interns work with me for some time before they are allowed in the kitchen. So first get me some pots and pans.
Congratulations, you passed your first test! A good intern should carry out tasks without asking questions.
So now that you've shown your determination, let's proceed.. Wait... My mustache is crooked, isn't it?
column17: We have to deal with this mustachtrophe, quickly!
column18: Oh, thank you, now I can fix it!

column6: Merde! Is that very bad? Do you have a pocket mirror by any chance? I need to see!
I don't have my mustache comb on me. Bring me a mustache care kit, please, I can't stand it when my mustache isn't in perfect order.
Very good, *name*! You passed tests two and three. First, you've shown you're not that easy to take by surprise.
column7: Ha-ha, so that was a test!

column6: Secondly, you demonstrated that you're a kind person and you're ready to help even if it is not part of your job. Excellent!

column7: Are you sure it was a test?...

column6: Alright, enough with the tests! I just received extremely exciting news!
column17: This is a great occasion we have to prepare to!
column18: Very good. Let me and the waiters handle the rest.

column6: An extremely famous American actress chose our restaurant for her dinner today. That shows how great our restaurant is!

column7: I though it'd be the Queen

column6: We need to decorate before she arrives. Get me flowers, lots of flowers! It's extremely important, go go!
It's time for you to go to the kitchen! Ask Enzo if he needs anything. He's in charge of the main jewel of our restaurant - the food!
Hello there! Nice to meet you, Gabriel told me a lot of good things about you, young lady. Welcome to my kitchen, the place where magic happens!
column17: Please, help me do my magic!
column18: Très bien! Now we can begin to wiz!

column6: Real magic! A boring celery stick changes its texture, its taste, its flavor and becomes something different. Isn't that magic?

column7: I'd rather you pulled it out of a hat

column6: Unfortunately, we're not free from evil magic either. For example, my favorite cutting board just magically disappeared!
I really need it to cook the most magnificent dinner for our esteemed guests, so please, bring me a new cutting board, alrighty?
Oh, look at that! I stained my snow-white apron! What's happening to me? I've become sloppy! Am I growing old?
column7: No-no, it can happen to anyone!
column17: I don't want to ruin the magic because of a stain!
column18: Wonderful, thank you! Now there's no way I spoil anything!

column6: I can't work in a stained apron! I risk spoiling the food by a rogue aroma, or even spreading germs, oh gross!
Please, get me a new apron, that's very important! And while you're at it, be so kind and get a cap as well.
*name*, I have an announcement to make: I officially take you as my wizard apprentice! So I'll teach you my secret recipe!
column17: Best Indian spices and the freshest beef bones - that's what I need!
column18: Magnifique! Here's the recipe I promised you.

column6: But first I need some ingredients of exceptional quality for the masterpiece I'm cooking today! Get me some spices and bones for the broth!
My apprentice, I am sorry to say, but we have to part now! Gabriel asked me to lend you to him, he needs some help.
column7: If he needs my help, I'll help

column6: So, you met Enzo, right? You seemed somewhat overwhelmed. He's, how to put it, quite effervescent and it can be too much for some.
column17: I can see dust with my bare eyes!!!
column18: Great, let's get cleaning!

column7: That's a way to put it

column6: I am glad you find him pleasant, I've had interns resigning after just a few hours of his magic talk. He's a good man, though.
Enough of that! We have a lot to do. For example, we need to clean up, and we're understaffed for the moment.
You know, sick leaves, maternity leaves, all these irritating things. Nonetheless, I need you to get some cleaning utensils, please.
Now that we're done cleaning, it's time to think about our own appearances, don't you think?
column17: Don't underestimate the power of polished shoes!
column18: Let it shine!

column7: I look fine, you look fine

column6: All the waiters and kitchen staff should look stunning today, our reputation depends on it! Get me some shoe was and a brush!
column7: Why, if you don't mind me asking?

column6: Statistics show that people pay lots of attention to the others' shoes, so we need to make sure all the shoes here shine!
We made the first step and made sure all the shoes are polished, but that's not it!
column17: One can't be too careful when it comes to whitness!
column18: Parfait! So white it's almost blinding!

column6: Just in case, I'd like to change all the waiters' aprons to perfectly clean new ones. The normal ones are clean too, but not clean enough!
Please, take care of this. I still have to brief the waiters on how important today is for the future of this temple of food!
This is all I needed you to do for now, but I'm sure Enzo can't wait to see his apprentice again!
Here comes my beloved apprentice! Did Gabriel make you run around a lot? Poor you!
column17: Please, get me some hot sauce, I'm starving!
column18: Oh, this smell, so good and appetizing!

column6: Ha-ha, I'm afraid I'm no better! It's a busy day today, *name*, so we're all running around. I haven't even had time for my lunch!
Awful, being around all this food.. But I need hot sauce to eat, please, bring it, I can't leave the kitchen!
Now I can eat my hot-dogs, finally! Thank you, I'd have had starved to death if not for you!
Well, we all have our little weaknesses, don't we? Besides, these hot-dogs are otherworldly!
Oh my god, while we were out for lunch someone broke into the restaurant and stole my cooking gear!
column17: I knew Martine was evil, but I've never though her capable of something like that
column18: My pans, my pots! What a relief!

column7: Oh no! How could it happen?

column6: That must've been my sworn enemy, Chef Martine from the restaurant nearby, the evil witch!

column7: She seems to hold a grudge

column6: Please, get me some new pots, pans and all that. Be swift, or we risk to be late with the dinner today! That's unacceptable!

column7: I am not sure I can make it!

column6: I can understand why they took my pans, but my scissors? How did they know I use them to peel shrimp and crayfish!?
column17: Were we cursed? It feels like someone suck out all my culinary magic!
column18: Oh good, now I can deal with that shrimp!

column6: It's not important who's to blame, though. I need those scissors, so, please, get them for me!!!
I can't stop thinking it might've been an inside job! Who could've done this, we're all like family here....

column7: The closest ones are the worst

column6: With this robbery and all I'm completely stressed out. Look: my hands are shaking! How am I to cook now?
column17: I can't go to the kitchen and cook in this emotional state!
column18: Oh, thank you. My music!

column7: I am shaking all over too!

column6: I suppose some music could help me relax.. I don't have my headphones on me today, though. Get me headphones, please.
I calmed down a little bit already, I think now I can get to the kitchen and start preparing the dinner, thank you.

column7: Just try not to cut yourself

column6: This robbery is just crazy business. I couldn't even imagine someone will dare do something like that!
column17: Why rob someone at all if you just leave the mess?.
column18: Oh great, now we can clean the mess up

column6: Fortunately nothing else is missing! The robbers made quite a mess, though. What were they looking for, I wonder.
We can't call the police, what a pity! They'd make us close up for today, and that's not an option.
That's the drawback of our business. Enough about that. Could you bring me a box to clean up the mess?
column7: If you need it, of course
I still think we need the police

column6: What the...! My phone broke down! Can you imagine?
column17: Making this call is my first priority!
column18: Thank you, you saved us again.

column6: That's just unacceptable, these modern electronics always let you down in the most crucial moment!
column7: I'm sure we can fix it

column6: There's no time to fix it even! Could you get me a new phone? I have to make an extremely important call!
Now I'll be calling the mayor's office. We need the Tower to be all shiny and pretty earlier today for your guests!

column7: What Tower are we talking about?

column6: I mean the Eiffel Tower, of course! Oh, sorry, I'm a bit on edge with everything going on. Now let me make the call, please.
I am sorry I snapped at you before, all this is quite unnerving. I know that as a manager I should be able to control myself better...
column17: With all this fuss around I completely forgot about my suit!
column18: Now I am ready, excellent!

column6: I'm afraid I have to ask you to run a couple more errands for the restaurant. Is that alright?
I completely forgot to take my tuxedo from the cleaners, and they're closed now. Could you find me a tuxedo? Don't forget a bow-tie too.
Now, there's one last thing, and we're all ready. Will you take care of name cards to place on the tables? Make them luxurious, please.
column17: This cards will be right in front of the guests' eyes, so they must be extremely gorgeous
column18: That's it, merci beaucoup!

column6: That's a disaster! A recipe of the unique desert we were planing to cook today have disappeared! That must've been the thief! We're ruined!
Excuse me, I have the recipe right here. I saw someone break into this restaurant, so I chased them and got this recipe back.
That's amazing! You saved us, good sir, thank you so much! We're in your debt, how can we repay it?
Actually.. I am opening my own little cafe nearby. I winder if you could help, you have so much experience after all!
I am so happy you agreed to help me and even tasked one of your interns to assist me. I really don't deserve such kindness
column17: First to stock up the kitchen, right?
column18: Are you reading my mind? That's exactly what I thought of!

column6: No-no, don't say that. You saved us, literally, and we, as gentlemen, have to repay you. Besides, *name* volunteered herself.
Thank you, *name*. I haven't introduced myself properly, I'm Jules Beaufort, an aspiring restaurateur. Nice to meet you.
Shall we begin then? Could you first get me some pots, pans and all this? We need to stock up the kitchen!
So, now that the kitchen is stocked, we need to take care of the pastry stands. It's gonna be just a small cafe, after all.
column17: Showcasing the deserts is very important for small cafes, right?
column18: Tres bien! These are very pretty!

column6: Nothing fancy yet. I am just starting, after all. One day I'll own the best restaurant in France, but not just yet.
Well, even if we're gonna be small, we still have to have recognizable style. That's what they taught me in the business school
column7: You went to a business school?
column17: We need to think of this cafe as of a brand from the very beginning
column18: This is a very creative logo, thank you

column7: Don't tell me you hold an MBA

column6: That's right. I used to work in consulting, I am not even sure what I was doing there. One day I just snapped, bought this place and voila!
That doesn't matter anymore, though! I'm a restaurateur now. As I said, we need a style. Let's start by getting some napkins with our logo.
I almost forgot about one other thing. We need spices, that what the baker I hired told me. Apparently, they're used in baking
column17: I am not sure why exactly we need spices, but since we do, please get some
column18: These actually have a very pleasant aroma

column7: And you want to open a cafe?

column6: Don't judge me, please. I might've always loved food, but I'm new to the culinary world. That's why I count on you.
column7: Right, sorry, I'll be right back

column6: Thank you a lot. This is all for now. Besides, Mr. Enzo called and asked, I quote, his favorite apprentice to pay a visit to him.
Congratulations, *name*! The dinner we all worked so hard to prepare was a complete success!
column17: White magic won! Let's celebrate!
column18: Oh wonderful! Cheers!

column6: Oh, right, you didn't get to see the actress! I am so sorry, I bet you wanted to. Don't worry, you'll meet here, you're so gifted!
We're celebrating here, so I wanted to ask something of you. Could you go get champagne?

column7: I'm turning into an errand girl...

column6: Ho-ho-ho, I am so happy, so uplifted! This was a great accomplishment for this restaurant!
column17: I love croissants!
column18: Let's eat now!!! And here's a recipe for your great work!

column6: You're right, I might've head too much champagne on empty stomach. Could you bring me some croissants?
Oh, wait a moment! Bring a pastry stand as well, I can't eat myself and not share with my work family!
Oh, that was a great celebration! Don't you think?
column17: We need to clean up before Gabriel scolds us all to death.
column18: Great timing, now we'll get cleaning

column6: We definitely need to repeat it some day. But this place is a mess. That's a good thing Gabriel left earlier, he'd have been furious...
column7: Mess is easy to clean up

column6: We really need to clean up. It's a pity my wizardry doesn't work the way they write in books... So we need napkins and a broom. Please?
*name*, come here for a second, I need to ask for your help again, but this time it's a secret.
column17: I can't watch my subjects suffer
column18: First aid kit is here? Great!

column6: Well, some of my dear apprentices seem to have had a bit too much and they're not feeling very well. The young, always so enthusiastic!
I want to get them something from the, well, symptoms, but I don't want to put them in an uncomfortable position.
So please, get me a first aid kit, just do it as discretely as possible. And don't tell Gabriel under any circumstances!
You're a real treasure, *name*! Do you know that? I hope you succeed in your blogging, even though I'm not quite sure what it is.

column7: I wish it was that easy

column6: Oh, I am so glad I returned! I am running off my feet here! I beg you to lend me a hand! We're almost ready for the opening after all.
column17: Please, help me, I'll teach you a recipe, I promise. Any apron will do!
column18: Oh, thank goodness! And thank you of course!

column6: My patissiere says he can't work without apron and toque. I believe him, but I don't have any, and I don't have time.
I am a businessman, so I know how it works. If you help me, I'll teach you a recipe I learned from my father. It's French classics!
Man, there's so much to do in order to open up a cafe! I was less busy working in consulting, and that was hell, believe me.
column17: Eiffel tower and flags aren't too much? No, I think not..
column18: I really appriciate this

column6: I am so grateful to you. Even if you only do this to learn that recipe, you're really saving me right here.
column7: I am actually glad to help

column6: I decided I need to decorate my cafe for the tourists. I calculate them to make up the majority of my future clientel.
I need an Eiffel tower figurine and a few French flags. Could you handle this, please?

column7: As long as I am rewarded, sure

column6: Oh well, everything is ready for the opening night! This is gonna be something..
column17: Champagne is classy, so we need champagne
column18: Splendid! You have great taste in wine, *name*

column6: I used my connections from the old job to invite some influential people in town, writers, critics, you know
I hope they give us good reviews. But I need to organize a proper reception. Could you help?
Great! Then first, please, get some champagne and ice buckets to serve it. This all should be as classy as possible.
Congratulations, *name*, you and me did a great job! Basically, everything is ready to open.
column17: I just need to dress up and we get rolling!
column18: This color matches my eyes, I suppose

column6: One last thing: I really need to dress up for tonight, don't you think? I like my casual style, but this is a classy event.
Please, get me some fancy suit. I think a tuxedo will do best.
Thank you a lot. I know I said that before, but I really don't know how I'd have managed without you.
I want to invite you to this opening night too. Dress up nicely and come join me.We're a friends, after all.
However, I must say, if you mention my humble establishment in your blog, I'll really appreciate it.
